Package org.neo4j.server.security.auth

Class LegacyCredential

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.server.security.auth.LegacyCredential
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Credential
    public class LegacyCredential
extends Object
implements Credential
    This class is used for 3.5 community security, InternalFlatFile, SetDefaultAdminCommand and SetInitialPasswordCommand The new security has its own more secure version of Credential

      • byteEquals

        private static boolean byteEquals​(byte[] actual,
                                  byte[] given)

        Utility method that replaces Arrays.equals() to avoid timing attacks. The length of the loop executed will always be the length of the given password. Remember INACCESSIBLE credentials should still execute loop for the length of given password.

        Parameters:
        actual - the actual password
        given - password given by the user
        Returns:
        whether the two byte arrays are equal

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Object o)

        Equality to always check for both salt and password hash as a safeguard against timing attack.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
